Package org.springframework.integration.json

Provides classes supporting JSON in Spring Integration.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JsonPropertyAccessor.WrappedJsonNode<T extends com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>
    The base interface for wrapped JsonNode.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JsonPathUtils
    Utility class to JsonPathUtils.evaluate(java.lang.Object, java.lang.String, com.jayway.jsonpath.Predicate...) a jsonPath on the provided object.
    JsonPropertyAccessor
    A SpEL PropertyAccessor that knows how to read properties from JSON objects.
    JsonPropertyAccessor.ArrayNodeAsList
    An AbstractList implementation around ArrayNode with JsonPropertyAccessor.WrappedJsonNode aspect.
    JsonPropertyAccessor.ToStringFriendlyJsonNode
    A JsonPropertyAccessor.WrappedJsonNode implementation to represent JsonNode as string.
    JsonToObjectTransformer
    Transformer implementation that converts a JSON string payload into an instance of the provided target Class.
    ObjectToJsonTransformer
    Transformer implementation that converts a payload instance into a JSON string representation.
    SimpleJsonSerializer
    Extremely simple JSON serializer.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ObjectToJsonTransformer.ResultType  

Package org.springframework.integration.json Description

Provides classes supporting JSON in Spring Integration.
